abstract:
be an RCT [randomized control tria;] with 1:1 parallel twoarm design.
be related to spine surgery involving preoperative or intraoperative or postoperative variables.
have a dichotomous primary or secondary outcome.
involving human subjects
report a statistically significant primary or secondary outcome measure.
continuous variable outcomes like pain scores, Oswestry Disability Index scores, time to union without predefined clinical success criteria.
